title: Rems to Pixels Converter – REM ↔ PX with Custom Root Font Size

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Core formulas used by this converter Given base font size B in pixels: px = rem × B rem = px ÷ B Example (B = 16): 1.5 rem × 16 = 24 px. Conversely, 24 px ÷ 16 = 1.5 rem.
